SELECT
'设备' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='减速机、液压控制泵站' AND SC_CONTENT LIKE '油箱%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='减速机、液压控制泵站' AND SC_CONTENT LIKE '是否%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='减速机、液压控制泵站' AND SC_CONTENT LIKE '螺栓%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='自助加油泵' AND SC_CONTENT = '是否正常' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='耙架提升油缸' AND SC_CONTENT = '是否正常' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='消泡泵' AND SC_CONTENT = '是否正常' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='行走轮及链条' AND SC_CONTENT = '是否正常' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a7' FROM (SELECT SC_CONTENT,RESULT,SC_PART, (CASE WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN (ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult
FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (DEPT_NAME="精尾设备" AND devName="NJG型周边传动浓缩机（硫浓密）") AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as tmp

SELECT '电仪' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='硫45m浓密油泵电机1号（行走）' AND SC_CONTENT ='测振' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='硫45m浓密油泵电机1号（行走）' AND SC_CONTENT ='测温' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='硫45m浓密油泵电机1号（行走）' AND SC_CONTENT ='有无异响' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='硫45m浓密油泵电机1号（行走）' AND SC_CONTENT ='有无松动' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='硫45m浓密油泵电机2号（提耙）' AND SC_CONTENT ='测振' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='硫45m浓密油泵电机2号（提耙）' AND SC_CONTENT ='测温' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='硫45m浓密油泵电机2号（提耙）' AND SC_CONTENT ='有无异响' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN devName='硫45m浓密油泵电机2号（提耙）' AND SC_CONTENT ='有无松动' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a8' FROM ( SELECT SC_CONTENT,devName, (CASE WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN (ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult
FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (DEPT_NAME="电仪工段" AND ZONE_NAME="硫浓密机NJG45S") AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp
